Warranty & Support

Price: $12.99
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:13:33 UTC – Details)


“2022 the latest generation of SmartWatch
Designed for customers seeking appearance, function and sport, health tracker / information notice / personal help / sport mode / waterproof wick / fashionable appearance
1. Before using for the first time, the smartwatch must be charged and activated
2. Charging method The belt is detachable, and the built-in charging cable is used for charging
3. During heart rate detection, please keep your arm stand still. To improve the accuracy of heart rate detection, please wear the smart watch correctly and keep the wearing part clean.
4. Fitness watch supports the use hand washing, raining, under cold shower or swimming. But use under hot shower, diving, surfing etc. is unsupported.
5. Smart watch monitoring data may be affected by many factors, such as height, weight, gender, step length, and physical condition. It is recommended that you use the correct data when initially filling in the information.
6. The fitness watch standby time is about 30days, but the actual situation will affect its standby time, such as opening the smart reminder and turning on the screen brightness etc.
7. Multi-language support, such as English, German, Italian, Japanese, French, Spanish, Hindi, Indonesia.
8.If you have any questions during use, please contact us directly in the following ways.
➤ Main functions
● Health tracking: heart rate / blood pressure / sleep monitoring / calories / speed / distance meter / pedometer
● Notification: call reminder / SMS / email / FB / Twitter / Skype, etc.
● Personal assistance: alarm clock / stopwatch / sedentary reminder / remote camera
● Sport mode: walking / running / cycling / soccer
● Waterproof grade: IPX65 degree of protection, easy to use. Choose other fun activities or deep water activities.
Package:
1 x smart watch,
1 x user manual,
1 x manual “
【24 Hours Health Monitoring】 WATAHATIC smart watch fitness tracker supports 24 sports modes such as running , walking , bicycle, yoga and more. Our smartwatchs can easily monitor your heart rate,sleep state in real time via our app “FITPRO”, and provide comprehensive analysis of your sleep quality to help you develop a healthier lifestyle.
【Compatibility & Battery life】This smartwatch supports IOS 8.4, Android 4.4 or above. Compatible with iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, Xiaomi and so on. The smart watch can be used for 8-12 days or 30 days standby when charged for 2 hours.
【USB Charging】WATAHATIC smart watches can be charged without a data cable. Just take out the strap and plug it directly into the USB port to charge(USB charger not included，you need to use your own USB charger).
【Stay Connected to Your Day】Connect fitness tracker with your phone, you will never miss a call and a message. It will vibrate to alert you if your phone receives a phone call, SMS text and SNS messages. SNS alert: Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Instagram, Linked in, Skype and so on.
【Useful Functions】Besides having 24 sports modes, this fitness tracker also provides many useful functions like breath guiding, do not disturb mode, vibration alarm clocks, and stopwatch. By wearing this smart watch on your wrist, you not only ensure that you keep your heart rate, exercise, and sleep quality monitored but also get a chance to manage your stress level, develop a good sense of time and do a lot more.

4.5
